short_summary: Supplier to provide 622-9978-314 EFD-4077 display electronic flight for transport Canada (TC), air service directorate (ASD).",
description: technical description of the work required:",
full_summary:
# 623-4978-324 Electronic Flight Display Tender

## Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Transport (TC) invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for a requirement to acquire the Electronic Flight Display (EFD) system for the Challenger aircraft.

## Key Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4566696778
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4566696778
* **Publication Date**: May 13, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 9, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Goods Classification**: Aircraft digital altitude control systems (UNSPSC 25201601)
* **Trading Partners**: CPTPP, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and more

## Solicitation Method

This procurement will be awarded through a Request for Proposal process with the lowest price as the selection criteria.

## Delivery and Locations

The goods are required to be delivered in Ottawa, Canada.

## Contracting Entity and End-User

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity**: Department of Transport (TC)

## Point of Contact

* **Name**: Edmond Egikian
* **Email**: [edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not specified
* **Fax**: Not specified
